name: 2017 International Conference on Structural Materials and Civil Engineering
content: 2017 International Conference on Structural Materials and Civil Engineering ( ICSMCE 2017) will be held from May 27-29, 2017 in Bangkok, Thailand. This Conference is organized by Hong Kong Association for Science and Engineering it dedicates to creating a stage for exchanging the latest research results and sharing the advanced research methods. \*Keynote Speakers Prof. Alessandro Pegoretti from University of Trento, Italy; Prof.Taiki Saito from Toyohashi University of Technology; Prof. Anand Krishna Asundi from Nanyang Technological University, Singapore; Prof. Huan-Tsung Chang, National Taiwan University, Chinese Taipei Prof.Yip Mum Wai, from Tunku Abdul Rahman University College, Malaysia \*Program Prerview May. 27, 2017: Registration May. 28, 2017: Opening Speech + KN Speeches+ Technical Sessions+ Closing Ceremony+ Dinner Banquet May 29 2017: One day tour \*Paper Submission 1, Papers can be submitted as PDF via EasyChair: https://easychair.org/conferences/?conf=icsmce2017 2\. You can also choose to submit your paper directly to icsmce@hkase.org \*CONTACT US Ms.Silvia Chan Email: icsmce@hkase.org Website: www.icsmce.org
organizers: Hong Kong Association for Science and Engineering
